 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טִין‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==clay== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טִינָה‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (yet see [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>8</sup>)); — emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֲסַף טִינָא‎</span> [[Dan.2.41|Dan 2:41]]; [[Dan.2.43|Dan 2:43]].
